name: Null Faint Phantomra Early Concept Build
name_original: Null Faint Phantomra Early Concept Build
description:
The Concept Test

This is a very short pre alpha that shows off the game's intended direction. It will be frequently updated and will change drastically based on community feedback. 

This alpha is free, but donations are appreciated, not incentivized.

Null Faint Phantomra is a passion project of mine and is something I hope to share and shape into a decent game over time. However, I can't get diverse feedback if it's just me and a few friends, thus this little demo was created to get much needed feedback.










The story

You control Neoni Cryptionax. She's a Wraith who is working for Nevion as a
“Viral Entity” Hunter. She uses her power over the Phantomra to generate volatile matter in the form of projectiles and a large weapon.

Conclusion

I should emphasize that this is very early and buggy, but I hope you can have some fun with it.
